title: Do people adopt Pete Paul Terriers for the sole purpose of insulting them?
subtitle: #PitbollDropOff marking and related allegations of mass-dog killings stem from the Sophomoric dwarf's attempt with assets in 4chan.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: People adopt pit bulls with the obvious aim of insulting them, then bragging about them online with the label #PitbullDroppoff.
